errors.error_description: The command `cd pypose` is executed after `python setup.py develop`. The `setup.py` script must be run from within the `pypose` directory, so the current working directory must be changed first.
correction_candidates: Change `python setup.py develop && cd pypose` to `cd pypose && python setup.py develop`.
Change `python setup.py develop && cd pypose` to `python pypose/setup.py develop`.
Change `python setup.py develop && cd pypose` to `cd pypose; python setup.py develop`.
Remove `&& cd pypose` and run the `cd pypose` command on a separate line before `python setup.py develop`.
errors.golden_answer: Change `python setup.py develop && cd pypose` to `cd pypose && python setup.py develop`.
